item.title: How to use the WillPopScope widget in Flutter to show Press Back Button Again to Exit App?
item.description: Introduction In this article, we will discuss how to use the WillPopScope widget in Flutter to show a snackbar saying press back button again to exit app. If you are not familiar with the WillPopScope widget, you can read the article How to use the WillPopScope widget in Flutter In order to exit the app, we need to press the back button twice. The first time we press the back button, we will show a snackbar saying press back button again to exit app.
